channel.title: Localdate on Simple Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Localdate on Simple Solution

item.title: Joda Time DateTime by Examples in Java
item.description: In this Java tutorial, we learn how to use the org.joda.time.DateTime class of Joda Time library by different example Java programs. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add Joda Time library to your Java project To use Joda Time Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. compile group: 'joda-time', name: 'joda-time', version: '2.10.9' To use Joda Time Java library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.
